unnormalised: Hey guys, training regimens are key, right? I saw Dr. Sharma at AIIMS talking about it. He mentioned how crucial it is for kabaddi players in UP. Plus, a good diet costing around Rs. 500 daily helps. My chacha, Rajesh, runs 5 km every morning in Delhi! Imagine, needing a 200 sq ft gym just for that!
normalised: Hey guys, training regimens are key, right? I saw Doctor Sharma at A I I M S talking about it. He mentioned how crucial it is for kabaddi players in U P. Plus, a good diet costing around rupee five hundred daily helps. My chacha, Rajesh, runs five kilometer every morning in Delhi! Imagine, needing a two hundred square feet gym just for that!
